overview: There are events in this world that can't be explained - and shouldn't. This is an "atmos-fearic" story about a direct lineage of men feeding a centuries old creature in the woods that has a taste for human flesh. On a hunting trip that goes awry, Hank must pass down responsibility of the sacred land to his son, Caleb. With this land comes great duty. They must be fed. Sacrifices are needed.
title: The Shack
